banner.description: New generation freight forwarder - Digital and expert logistics solutions

hero.title: Optimize your flows. Spend less. Act better.
hero.subtitle: Accelerate your international supply chain
hero.description: Noveo Logistics is a new generation freight forwarder, combining digital technologies and business expertise to connect Europe with the rest of the world seamlessly.

quote.title: Tell us what you need
quote.spotQuote: Spot quote - for your single shipment.
quote.tariffQuote: Tariff quote - for multiple or frequent shipments.
quote.offer: Offer - To start a dialogue on Logistics solutions

logistics.title: Would you like to know more about our logistics solutions?

expertise.title: Our sector expertise
expertise.description: Noveo Logistics supports demanding players in complex, regulated or strategic sectors.
expertise.subtitle: Our strength: adapting our transport, customs and logistics solutions to the specificities of each industry.
expertise.transitaire: Freight Forwarder – AEO Approved Customs Broker

mission.title: Our mission.
mission.subtitle: Streamline your supply chain with the best of technology and human expertise
mission.feature1: An intuitive digital platform (TMS, visibility, booking, document management)
mission.feature2: An experienced team, by your side to manage:

energy.title: Energy, Oil & Gas
energy.description: Transport of heavy parts, offshore equipment, pipelines, pumps, with management of specific formalities (IMO, ADR).

dangerous.title: Dangerous goods
dangerous.description: Chemistry, pharmaceutical, lithium batteries... Total compliance with IATA, IMDG and ADR regulations.

aeronautic.title: Aeronautics & defense
aeronautic.description: Spare parts, tools, engines, critical components. Express solutions, real-time tracking and maximum confidentiality.

wines.title: Wines, spirits & sensitive products
wines.description: Fine temperature management, certified transport, high-end logistics for excise products.

automotive.title: Automotive and mobility
automotive.description: Spare parts, electronic components, sequenced logistics, D+1 deliveries in Europe, coordination from Asia.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce & B2C distribution
ecommerce.description: Cross-border import/export, fast customs clearance, B2B2C logistics, marketplace integration, urgent transport and digital tracking.

medical.title: Medical devices & health
medical.description: Regulated transport of medical devices, implants, dental consumables, with ISO expertise, CE marking and medical customs.

fluidLogistics.title: Benefit from fluid logistics
fluidLogistics.subtitle: Centralize your operations, optimize your performance
fluidLogistics.feature2: Receive proactive alerts on your shipments
fluidLogistics.feature3: Access your logistics data and documents
fluidLogistics.cta: Book an appointment with a Noveo expert

volumes.label: tons of air freight per year

items.quote: Noveo Logistics revolutionized our Asia-Europe supply chain. Their digital platform provides complete visibility and their teams are exceptionally responsive.
items.name: Marie Dubois

items.quote: For our wine shipments to China, Noveo perfectly masters customs constraints and cold chain management. A trusted partner for 3 years.
items.name: Jean-Pierre Martin

items.quote: GDP compliance and serialized traceability are crucial for our medical devices. Noveo exceeds our expectations with impeccable service.
items.name: Sophie Chen

items.quote: Express service for our critical aerospace parts. Noveo guarantees the tightest deadlines with maximum security.
items.name: Carlos Rodriguez

items.quote: Dangerous goods transport in full IATA/IMDG compliance. Remarkable technical expertise and valuable advice.
items.name: Fatima Al-Rashid

items.quote: Next-day deliveries in Europe for our e-commerce. Real-time tracking platform reassures our customers and optimizes our customer service.
items.name: Thomas Mueller

items.quote: Heavy parts transport for our offshore projects. Noveo perfectly coordinates the most complex multimodal operations.
items.name: Anna Petersen

items.quote: Customized management of our automotive supplies from Asia. Intuitive interface and exemplary team responsiveness.
items.name: Giuseppe Romano

items.quote: Flexible logistics solutions for our product launches. Noveo adapts to our changing needs with remarkable agility.

items.quote: Trusted partner for our international shipments. Personalized service and business expertise that make all the difference.
